minions.name: Aunt of Drakes
minions.description: Talent: Give control of one of your minions to another player to draw another card and play an extra action

minions.name: Foot of the King
minions.description: Ongoing: At the end of your turn, you may take control of a minion you own

minions.name: Bethrothed
minions.description: You may give control of this minion to another player. Ongoing: The owner of this minion gains 1 VP if another player wins this base and conrols this minion

minions.name: Sneaky Squire
minions.description: You may give control of this minion to another player to play an extra minion

actions.name: Fate of the Favorites
actions.description: Each player destroys a minion they own

actions.name: Inevitable Betrayal
actions.description: Special: Before a base scores, take control of a minion you own there

actions.name: Out of Sight
actions.description: Each player returns a minion they own to their hand

actions.name: Banner Call
actions.description: Take control of any number of minions you own

actions.name: Red Birthday Party
actions.description: Destroy a minion you own and all minions with less power on the same base

actions.name: Repaying Debts
actions.description: Give control of one of your minions to another player to draw two cards and play an extra minion

actions.name: Activate the Spy
actions.description: Take control of a minion you own. Play an extra action

actions.name: Hostage Exchange
actions.description: Give another player control of one of your minions to take control of one of their minions of equal or lesser power
